title: Peep Show
description: BimBamBoom presents PEEP SHOW! Chicago's wildest sex & comedy show features two acts of scintillating burlesque performances by the striptease artists of BimBamBoom! Featuring the unforgettable talents of Lauren Bacchanal, Ronnie Rouge, Violet Mist, Gemini Blackheart, Miss Lou Vella D'Lish, Polly Glamorous, Zelda Hipsgerald, Gwendolyn the Gorgeous, Gata Habbie, Manny Schevitz & other burlesque superstars! Comedy performed by Jimmy Innuendo, Melvina Czervicks or Bubble Wizardry by Sam Rose! Hosted by Max Flattery, Dizzie Daisy, Lucien or Mrs. Yuka Layme! EVERY SHOW IS DIFFERENT! EVERY SHOW IS WILD!

title: Laugh-Along, Live!
description: Laugh-Along, Live! is a monthly comedy show, movie screening, and party wrapped in one. Four comedians make jokes throughout a film (Ã  la Mystery Science Theater) and run activities for the audience. Audience participation is encouraged, as our shows often include drinking games, costume contests, trivia quizzes, dance-offs, and more.

title: MY Cabaret
description: Muffy Fishbasket (M) and Mrs. Yuka Layme (Y) combine the best elements of drag & live cabaret to bring you a night of music, sass, shade, and booze! This is an evening you won't want to forget. So, gather that tipping cash and get those tickets for this interactive DRAGARET experience you're not likely to find anywhere else!

title: Chicago Workshop Mic
description: Up and coming Chicago stand up comedians workshop new material and sign up for 10 minute sets at the Chicago Comedy Hour!

title: The Graveyard Shift
description: Musicians Welcomed. Bring your own instrument. Drink Specials.

title: DK's Full Five Fridays
description: 10 of Chicago's best up and coming comedians for only $10
